help: Exotica Technologies upgrades now require resources
Exotica Technologies upgrades are now FREE
Reloads the configuration for Exotica Technologies.
Adds an exotic chip to your fleet's inventory. Gives a normal type if no type is specified.\nTypes are: pure, guerilla, corrupted
Adds an upgrade chip to your fleet's inventory.
Spawns a debris field with a notable ship in it.

Adds an exotic item to your fleet's inventory.

EXOTIC ITEMS LIST:
 et_ammospool (for SpooledFeeders) 
 et_plasmacatalyst (for PlasmaFluxCatalyst)
 et_drivevent (for DriveFluxVent) 
 et_hangarforge (for HackedMissileForge) 
 et_equalizercore (for EquilizerCore) 
 et_phaseengine (for PhasefieldEngine) 
 et_shieldcrystal (for GuardianShield) 
 et_rewindchip (for RewindSystem) 
 et_missileautoloader (for MissileSpamSystem) 
 et_ammocreationmachine (for AmmoCraftingSystem)
